title: Farmer Role #6

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-At night, choose up to two foods to plant. They may be the same food.
-At night, if a plant is fully grown, you may feed it to someone. You can do this as many times as you want, and at the same time as you plant foods. You can feed yourself this way, and it will count as you visiting yourself.
Strawberry (grows in 1): Heals the target.
Garlic (grows in 1): Protects the target from roleblocking.
Peach (grows in 1): Roleblocks the target.
Sriracha (grows in 1): Prevents the target from voting the next day. Also, if you are part of any faction that could not win with town, it prevents the target from speaking the next day.
Starfruit (grows in 2): Permanently makes the target's abilities astral.
Carrot (grows in 3): Permanently allows the target to see all whispers.
AÃ§ai (grows in 3): Permanently makes the target have Invincible defense.
Mushroom (grows in 3): Hits the target with a Powerful attack.

desc:
Post 4694
*Why on Earth would so many people be farmers?*
